name: Cycle Race Manager -Pro Skills
description:
Cycle race is an amazing game of 2018 where you can challenge your friends to play together.Get fantastic racing experience by having wonderful city backgrounds. To reach the destination before others you have to safe yourself from corners.
you can select the "quick race" mode and "tournament" mode.

Features of the game
- This is a single player racing game
- you can select different riders
- Intuitive controls
- you can mute your background sound
- Explore your skills and have fun
